A Christmas Carol by Charles Dickens

28 August 2015

Credits

Graphics and design by the University of St Andrews digital communications team. Content written by Carley Hollis, digital communications team. Video, audio and additional photography by the student-run Lightbox Creative St Andrews.

Copyright for portraits, photographs and poems from Light Box remains with Norman McBeath and Robert Crawford.

Thanks

Robert Crawford and the University of St Andrews School of English.
Norman McBeath.
Professor Ifor Samuel and the University of St Andrews Organic Semiconductor Optoelectronics research group.
University of St Andrews Creative English MLitt students Helen Nicholson, Amanda Merritt and Tristram Fane Saunders.
Photographers, Kim Bennett, Gerry Priest and David Ogden.
Alice Crawford and the Digital Humanities Project, part of University of St Andrews Library, for digitising Light Box.
Rachel Hart and the University of St Andrews Special Collections, for access to Light Box.

Sources

  1. 'A Scottish Assembly', Robert Crawford, 1990, Oxford University Press.
  2. About the Year of Light. Retrieved May 7, 2015, from http://www.light2015.org/Home/About.html
